properties.title: Arctic+Snow on Sea Ice
properties.description: The study aimed at exploring, developing and validating different approaches to retrieve snow thickness over sea ice; to develop a new prototype processor; and to produce and validate an experimental dataset of snow thickness over the Arctic.
properties.osc:name: Arctic+Snow on Sea Ice
osc:consortium: MULLARD SPACE SCIENCE LABORATORY-UNIVERSITY COLLEGE LONDON (GB)
CENTRE FOR RESEARCH IN EARTH AND SPACE SCIENCE (CA)
